Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Prohibits state officers and employees from official involvement with a state project where the officer or employee acted as a consultant on such project
Summary: Prohibits state officers and employees from official involvement with a state project where the officer or employee acted as a consultant on such project.
LawCode: Amd ยง74, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting state officers and employees from official involvement with a state project where the officer or employee acted as a consultant on such project
